title: Bug 102623 - Image can't be refreshed after importing again.
description: When importing a new image into the layout, the image is not being refreshed and the original image is still being displayed.
OB: After importing a new image into the layout, the original image is still displayed instead of the new image.
EB: When importing a new image into the layout, the expected behavior is for the new image to be displayed.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the layout that contains an existing image.
2. Import a new image (e.g., 'image1.jpg') into the layout.
3. Observe that the original image is still displayed instead of the newly imported image.
